TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi Window extends System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl

summary.span: 提供创建、配置、显示和管理窗口和对话框的生存期的能力。

span.span: Provides the ability to create, configure, show, and manage the lifetime of windows and dialog boxes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用户与独立应用程序之间的交互点是一个窗口。The point of interaction between a user and a standalone application is a window. [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 窗口包含两个不同的区域：A [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] window consists of two distinct areas: - 承载 windows 修饰的非工作区，包括图标、标题、系统菜单、最小化按钮、最大化按钮、还原按钮、关闭按钮和边框。A non-client area, which hosts the windows adornments, including an icon, title, System menu, minimize button, maximize button, restore button, close button, and a border. - 承载特定于应用程序的内容的工作区。A client area, which hosts application-specific content. 标准窗口如下图所示：A standard window is shown in the following figure: ![Window 元素](~/add/media/windowoverviewfigure1.PNG "窗口元素")![Window elements](~/add/media/windowoverviewfigure1.PNG "Window elements") 封装了创建、配置、显示和管理窗口和对话框的生存期的功能，并提供了以下关键服务： encapsulates the ability to create, configure, show, and manage the lifetime of both windows and dialog boxes, and provides the following key services: **生存期管理**： 、、、、、、、、、。**Lifetime Management**: , , , , , , , , , . **窗口管理**： 、。**Window Management**: , , . **外观和行为**： 、、、、、、、、、、、、、、、、、**Appearance and Behavior**: , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , **对话框**： ，。**Dialog Boxes**: , . 此外， 公开了对管理应用程序中的所有窗口的特殊支持：Additionally, exposes special support for managing all of the windows in an application: - 应用程序维护当前在应用程序中实例化的所有窗口的列表。Application maintains a list of all the windows that are currently instantiated in the application. 此列表由 属性公开。This list is exposed by the property. - 默认情况下，将使用对应用程序中实例化的第一个 的引用自动设置 。By default, is automatically set with a reference to the first that is instantiated in an application. 从而使窗口成为主应用程序窗口。This thereby making the window the main application window. 可以使用标记、标记和代码隐藏或代码来实现 。A can be implemented using markup, markup and code-behind, or code. 主要用于显示独立应用程序的窗口和对话框。 is primarily used to display windows and dialog boxes for standalone applications. 但是，对于需要在窗口级别导航的应用程序（如向导），可以改用 ; 派生自 并通过浏览器样式的导航支持对其进行扩展。However, for applications that require navigation at the window level, such as wizards, you can use instead; derives from and extends it with browser-style navigation support. > [!NOTE] > 可使用 将可导航内容孤岛合并到其他内容和内容容器。Islands of navigable content can be incorporated into other content and content containers using . 需要实例化 `UnmanagedCode` 安全权限。 needs `UnmanagedCode` security permission to be instantiated. 这会产生以下影响：This has the following consequences: - 从 Internet 或本地 Intranet 区域启动时，[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clickonce](~/includes/tlasharptla-clickonce-md.md)]部署的独立应用程序将请求权限提升。[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clickonce](~/includes/tlasharptla-clickonce-md.md)]-deployed standalone applications will request permission elevation when launched from either the Internet or Local Intranet zones. - 请求小于完全权限的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)] 将无法实例化 windows 或对话框。[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)] that request anything less than full permissions will not be able to instantiate windows or dialog boxes. 有关独立应用程序部署和安全注意事项的信息，请参阅[WPF 安全策略-平台安全性](~/docs/framework/wpf/wpf-security-strategy-platform-security.md)。For information about standalone application deployment and security considerations, see [WPF Security Strategy - Platform Security](~/docs/framework/wpf/wpf-security-strategy-platform-security.md). 是 ，这意味着它可以包含任何类型的单个对象（例如字符串、图像或面板）。A is a , which means that it can contain a single object of any type (such as a string, an image, or a panel). 有关详细信息，请参阅 类。For more information, see the class. 此外， 是根元素，因此不能是另一个元素的内容的一部分。Also, is a root element and, therefore, cannot be part of another element's content. > [!NOTE] > 在 上通过样式设置的 、、和 属性将不会在运行时应用。The , , , and properties set on a through a style will not be applied at run time. ## 自定义窗口控件Customizing the Window Control 若要对多个 控件应用相同的属性设置，请使用 属性。To apply the same property settings to multiple controls, use the property. 您可以修改默认 以使控件具有独特的外观。You can modify the default to give the control a unique appearance. 有关创建 的详细信息，请参阅[通过创建 System.windows.controls.controltemplate> 自定义现有控件的外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。For more information about creating a , see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). 若要查看特定于 的部分和状态，请参阅[窗口样式和模板](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/window-styles-and-templates.md)。To see the parts and states that are specific to the , see [Window Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/window-styles-and-templates.md). 此控件的依赖属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control's default style. 如果按默认样式设置属性，则当控件出现在应用程序中时，属性可能会更改为默认值。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 默认样式取决于应用程序运行时使用的桌面主题。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认的 WPF 主题](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). [!INCLUDE[setting-a-visual-property](~/includes/visual-property-note.md)] ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用仅标记定义标准窗口：The following example shows how a standard window is defined using only markup: [!code-xaml[WindowSnippets#WindowMARKUPONLY](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WindowSnippets/CSharp/MarkupOnlyWindow.xaml#windowmarkuponly)] 下面的示例演示如何使用代码仅定义标准窗口：The following example shows how a standard window is defined using only code: [!code-csharp[WindowSnippets#WindowCODEONLY](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WindowSnippets/CSharp/CodeOnlyWindow.cs#windowcodeonly)] [!code-vb[WindowSnippets#WindowCODEONLY](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WindowSnippets/visualbasic/codeonlywindow.vb#windowcodeonly)] 下面的示例演示如何使用标记和代码隐藏的组合定义标准窗口。The following example shows how a standard window is defined using a combination of markup and code-behind. [!code-xaml[WindowSnippets#WindowXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WindowSnippets/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml#windowxaml)] [!code-csharp[WindowSnippets#WindowCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WindowSnippets/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml.cs#windowcodebehind)] [!code-vb[WindowSnippets#WindowCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WindowSnippets/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#windowcodebehind)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 确定窗口是否激活的规则与 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] `SetForegroundWindow` 函数（User32）使用的规则相同。The rules that determine whether the window is activated are the same as those used by the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] `SetForegroundWindow` function (User32.dll). 如果在不是用户的前景应用程序的 Windows Presentation Foundation 应用程序中激活该窗口，则会引发 事件。If the window is activated in a Windows Presentation Foundation application that is not the user's foreground application, event is raised. > [!NOTE] > 当窗口承载于浏览器中时，不能调用此方法。This method cannot be called when a window is hosted in a browser.

span.span: Occurs when a window becomes the foreground window.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当发生以下情况时，将激活窗口（成为前台窗口）：A window is activated (becomes the foreground window) when: - 首先打开该窗口。The window is first opened. - 用户通过使用鼠标、按 ALT + TAB 或从任务管理器中进行选择来切换到窗口。A user switches to a window by selecting it with the mouse, pressing ALT+TAB, or from Task Manager. - 用户单击窗口的任务栏按钮。A user clicks the window's taskbar button. 需要检测激活时间的窗口可以处理 事件。Windows that need to detect when they become activate can handle the event. 第一次激活窗口后，它可能会在其生存期内停用并多次重新激活。After a window is first activated, it may be deactivated and reactivated many times during its lifetime. 如果应用程序的行为或状态取决于其激活状态，它可以检查 来确定它所在的激活状态。If an application's behavior or state depends on its activation state, it can inspect to determine which activation state it's in. 还可以 应用程序。An application can also be .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果窗口的 属性设置为透明色，则使用 时，窗口将保持不透明。When the property of a window is set to a transparent color, using for example, the window remains opaque. 这意味着桌面和任何正在运行的应用程序 "低于" 窗口都无法查看。This means that the desktop and any running applications "beneath" the window cannot be seen. 若要启用这种类型的透明度， 必须设置为 `true`。To enable this type of transparency, must be set to `true`. 存在以便于创建非矩形窗口，因此当 设置为 `true`时，窗口的 属性必须设置为 。 exists to facilitate the creation of non-rectangular windows, and, consequently, when is set to `true`, a window's property must be set to . ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Close() cil managed

summary.span: 手动关闭 。

span.span: Manually closes a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用位于其标题栏中的几个已知系统提供的机制之一来关闭 ，包括：A can be closed using one of several, well-known, system-provided mechanisms located in its title bar, including: - ALT + F4。ALT+F4. - 系统菜单| **关闭**。System menu | **Close**. - "**关闭**" 按钮。**Close** button. 还可以使用开发人员提供的客户端区域中的几种已知机制之一来关闭 ，其中包括：A can also be closed using one of several well-known mechanisms within the client area that are provided by developers, including: - 主窗口上的**文件** | **退出**。**File** | **Exit** on a main window. - **文件** | **关闭**或子窗口上的 "**关闭**" 按钮。**File** | **Close** or a **Close** button on a child window. > [!NOTE] > 对话框中的 **"确定" 和 "** **取消**" 按钮也是开发人员提供的，尽管可能会设置 ，这将自动关闭通过调用 打开的窗口。**OK** and **Cancel** buttons on a dialog box are also developer-provided, although will likely set , which automatically closes a window that was opened by calling . 这些机制要求您显式调用 以关闭窗口。These mechanisms require you to explicitly call to close a window. > [!NOTE] > 如果窗口是通过调用 打开的，并且其 属性设置为 true ，则在单击按钮或按 ESC 键时，将自动关闭。If a window, opened by calling , and with a with its property set to true, will automatically close when the button is either clicked, or ESC is pressed. 但是，如果使用 打开该窗口，则必须显式调用 ，如 的 事件处理程序。If the window was opened using , however, must be explicitly called, such as from event handler for the . 关闭窗口会导致引发 事件。Closing a window causes the event to be raised. 如果未取消 事件，则会发生以下情况：If the event isn't canceled, the following occurs: - 从 中删除（如果存在 对象）。The is removed from (if an object exists). - 如果在显示拥有的 之前以及打开所有者 之后，将从所有者 中删除 。The is removed from the owner if the owner/owned relationship was established before the owned was shown and after the owner was opened. - 引发 事件。The event is raised. - 将释放 创建的非托管资源。Unmanaged resources created by the are disposed. - 如果调用 来显示 ，则 返回。If was called to show the , returns. 关闭 会导致其拥有的所有窗口都处于关闭状态。Closing a causes any windows that it owns to be closed. 此外，关闭 可能会导致应用程序停止运行，具体取决于 属性的设置方式。Furthermore, closing a may cause an application to stop running depending on how the property is set. > [!NOTE] > 当窗口承载于浏览器中时，不能调用此方法。This method cannot be called when a window is hosted in a browser. ## Examples 下面的示例演示正在处理的**文件** | **退出**菜单，以显式调用 。The following example shows a **File** | **Exit** menu being handled to explicitly call . [!code-xaml[WindowCloseSnippets#WindowCloseXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WindowCloseSnippets/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml#windowclosexaml)] [!code-csharp[WindowCloseSnippets#WindowCloseCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WindowCloseSnippets/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml.cs#windowclosecodebehind)] [!code-vb[WindowCloseSnippets#WindowCloseCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WindowCloseSnippets/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#windowclosecodebehind)]

summary.span: 在调用 之后立即发生，并且可进行处理以取消关闭窗口。

span.span: Occurs directly after is called, and can be handled to cancel window closure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以通过处理 来检测何时关闭窗口（例如，当调用 时）。 can be handled to detect when a window is being closed (for example, when is called). 此外， 可用于阻止窗口关闭。Furthermore, can be used to prevent a window from closing. 若要阻止窗口关闭，可以将 参数的 属性设置为 `true`。To prevent a window from closing, you can set the property of the argument to `true`. 如果单击窗口的 "关闭" 按钮，或者用户按 ALT + F4，则在调用 时引发 事件。The event is raised when is called, if a window's Close button is clicked, or if the user presses ALT+F4. 如果拥有的窗口是由其所有者窗口使用 打开的，并且 "所有者" 窗口关闭，则不会引发所拥有的窗口的 事件。If an owned window was opened by its owner window using , and the owner window is closed, the owned window's event is not raised. 如果窗口的所有者已关闭（请参阅 ），则不会在拥有的窗口上引发 。If the owner of a window is closed (see ), is not raised on the owned window. 如果调用 ，则将引发每个窗口的 事件。If is called, the event for each window is raised. 但是，如果取消 ，将忽略取消。However, if is canceled, cancellation is ignored. 如果会话由于用户注销或关闭而结束，则不会引发 ;处理 以实现取消应用程序闭包的代码。If a session ends because a user logs off or shuts down, is not raised; handle to implement code that cancels application closure. 如果要在应用程序的生存期内多次显示和隐藏窗口，并且不希望在每次显示窗口时化窗口，则可处理 事件，取消该事件，并调用 方法。If you want to show and hide a window multiple times during the lifetime of an application, and you don't want to reinstantiate the window each time you show it, you can handle the event, cancel it, and call the method. 然后，可以对同一实例调用 以重新打开它。Then, you can call on the same instance to reopen it. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了一个 ，它确定是否需要用户干预才能关闭。The following example demonstrates a that determines whether it needs user intervention to close. [!code-xaml[WindowClosingSnippets#WindowClosingXAML1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WindowClosingSnippets/CSharp/DataWindow.xaml#windowclosingxaml1)] [!code-csharp[WindowClosingSnippets](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WindowClosingSnippets/CSharp/DataWindow.xaml.cs)] [!code-vb[WindowClosingSnippets](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WindowClosingSnippets/visualbasic/datawindow.xaml.vb)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当发生以下情况时，将停用窗口（成为后台窗口）：A window is deactivated (becomes a background window) when: - 用户切换到当前应用程序中的另一个窗口。A user switches to another window in the current application. - 用户使用 ALT + TAB 或使用任务管理器切换到另一个应用程序中的窗口。A user switches to the window in another application by using ALT+TAB or by using Task Manager. - 用户单击另一应用程序中窗口的任务栏按钮。A user clicks the taskbar button for a window in another application. Windows，需要通过处理 事件来检测它们何时变为停用状态。Windows that need to detect when they become deactivated by handling the event. 第一次停用窗口后，它可能会在其生存期内重新激活和停用多次。After a window is first deactivated, it may be reactivated and deactivated many times during its lifetime. 如果应用程序的行为或状态取决于其激活状态，它可以检查 来确定它所在的激活状态。If an application's behavior or state depends on its activation state, it can inspect to determine which activation state it's in. 还可以 应用程序。An application can also be .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可从显示对话框的代码使用 ，以确定用户是否接受（`true`）或取消（`false`）对话框。 can be used from the code that showed a dialog box to determine whether a user accepted (`true`) or canceled (`false`) the dialog box. 如果接受了某个对话框，这将表示打开此对话框的代码以检索用户收集的数据并对其进行处理。If a dialog box was accepted, this signifies to the code that opened the dialog box to retrieve the data that was collected by the user and process it. 不过，如果已取消对话框，这表示调用代码应停止任何进一步的处理。If a dialog box was canceled, however, this signifies that calling code should stop any further processing. 默认情况下，当用户执行以下操作之一时，将取消对话框：By default, a dialog box is canceled when a user does one of the following: - PressesALT + F4。PressesALT+F4. - 单击 "**关闭**" 按钮。Clicks the **Close** button. - 从 "系统" 菜单中选择 "**关闭**"。Selects **Close** from the System menu. 在所有这些情况下，默认情况下都 `false` 。In all of these cases, is `false` by default. 对话框通常提供取消对话框的特殊按钮，该按钮的 属性设置为 `true`。A dialog box typically provides a special button to cancel a dialog, which is the button whose property is set to `true`. 按此方式配置的按钮会在按下或按 ESC 键时自动关闭窗口。A button configured this way will automatically close a window when either it is pressed, or when the ESC key is pressed. 在这两种情况下， 保持 `false`。In either of these cases, remains `false`. 对话框通常还提供 "接受" 按钮，该按钮的 属性设置为 `true`。A dialog box also typically provides an accept button, which is the button whose property is set to `true`. 按此方式配置的按钮会在按下或按下 ENTER 键时引发其 事件。A button configured this way will raise its event when either it or the ENTER key is pressed. 但是，它不会自动关闭对话框，也不会将 设置为 `true`。However, it won't automatically close the dialog box, nor will it set to `true`. 你需要手动编写此代码，通常来自默认按钮的 事件处理程序。You need to manually write this code, usually from the event handler for the default button. 当显示对话框但接受或取消时， `null`。 is `null` when the dialog box is shown but neither accepted nor canceled. 对话框关闭后，可以从 方法返回的值或通过检查 属性来获取对话框结果。After a dialog box closes, you can get the dialog result from the value returned by method, or by inspecting the property. 仅当 通过调用其 方法打开时，才能设置 。 can only be set when a is opened by calling its method. > [!NOTE] > 当窗口承载于浏览器中时，不能设置或获取此属性。You cannot set or get this property when a window is hosted in a browser. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何配置 "确定" 按钮和 "取消" 按钮以返回相应的 。The following example shows how to configure an OK button and a Cancel button to return the appropriate . [!code-xaml[WindowDialogResultSnippets#WindowDialogResultXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WindowDialogResultSnippets/CSharp/DialogBox.xaml#windowdialogresultxaml)] [!code-csharp[WindowDialogResultSnippets#WindowDialogResultCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WindowDialogResultSnippets/CSharp/DialogBox.xaml.cs#windowdialogresultcodebehind)] [!code-vb[WindowDialogResultSnippets#WindowDialogResultCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WindowDialogResultSnippets/visualbasic/dialogbox.xaml.vb#windowdialogresultcodebehind)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当窗口处于隐藏状态时，它不会关闭，同时也不会引发 和 事件。A window is not closed when it is hidden, and neither the nor event is raised. 相反，窗口的 属性设置为 。Instead, the window's property is set to . 如果某个窗口是应用程序的 并且应用程序的 ，则该应用程序不会关闭。If a window is the application's and the application's is , the application does not shut down. 同样，如果窗口是唯一的窗口并且应用程序的关闭模式为 ，应用程序也不会关闭。Likewise, the application does not shut down if a window is the only window and the application's shutdown mode is . 如果要在应用程序的生存期内多次显示和隐藏窗口，并且不希望每次显示窗口时都重新实例化窗口，可以处理 事件，取消该事件，并调用 方法。If you want to show and hide a window multiple times during the lifetime of an application, and you don't want to re-instantiate the window each time you show it, you can handle the event, cancel it, and call the method. 然后，可以对同一实例调用 以重新打开它。Then, you can call on the same instance to re-open it.

summary.span: 获取或设置窗口的图标。

span.span: Gets or sets a window's icon.

value.span: 一个表示图标的 对象。

span.span: An object that represents the icon.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Windows Presentation Foundation （WPF）独立应用程序有两种类型的图标：Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) standalone applications have two types of icons: - 一个程序集图标，它是使用应用程序的项目生成文件中的 `` 属性指定的。One assembly icon, which is specified by using the `` property in the application's project build file. 此图标用作程序集的桌面图标。This icon is used as the desktop icon for an assembly. > [!NOTE] > 在 Visual Studio 中进行调试时，你的图标可能不会由于承载进程而显示。When debugging in Visual Studio, your icon may not appear due to the hosting process. 如果运行可执行文件，则会显示图标。If you run the executable, the icon will appear. 有关详细信息，请参阅[托管进程 (vshost.exe)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c6b9e2be-f18d-4d75-ac52-56d55784734b)。For more information, see [Hosting Process (vshost.exe)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c6b9e2be-f18d-4d75-ac52-56d55784734b). - 通过设置 来指定每个窗口的一个图标。One icon per window that is specified by setting . 对于每个窗口，此图标用于其标题栏、其任务栏按钮和其 ALT 选项卡应用程序选择列表项。For each window, this icon is used in its title bar, its task bar button, and in its ALT-TAB application selection list entry. WPF 窗口始终显示一个图标。A WPF window always displays an icon. 如果未通过设置 提供一个，则 WPF 会根据以下规则选择要显示的图标：When one is not provided by setting , WPF chooses an icon to display based on the following rules: 1. 如果已指定，则使用程序集图标。Use the assembly icon, if specified. 2. 如果未指定程序集图标，则使用默认的 Microsoft Windows 图标。If the assembly icon is not specified, use the default Microsoft Windows icon. 如果使用 指定自定义窗口图标，则可以通过将 "" 设置为 "`null`" 来还原 "默认应用程序" 图标。If you use to specify a custom window icon, you can restore the default application icon by setting to `null`. 在 Windows 中，可以通过多种方式使用单个图标，包括显示在窗口的标题栏、窗口的任务栏、"ALT + TAB 文件选择列表" 中。A single icon can be used in a variety of ways in Windows, including being shown in the title bar of a window, the task bar for a window, the ALT+TAB file selection list. 其中每个显示使用不同大小的图标;16x16 像素图标将显示在窗口的标题栏和任务栏中，而32x32 像素图标则显示在 "ALT + TAB 文件选择列表" 中。Each of these shows the icon using a different size; a 16x16 pixel icon is displayed in the title bar of a window and in the task bar, while a 32x32 pixel icon is displayed in the ALT+TAB file selection list. 某些应用程序（如 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winexpl](~/includes/tlasharptla-winexpl-md.md)]）提供了 "**查看**" 菜单，可用于选择要查看的图标的大小。Some applications, like [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winexpl](~/includes/tlasharptla-winexpl-md.md)], provide a **View** menu that allows you to choose the size of the icon you'd like to view. 为了满足各种显示大小的需要，图标文件由一个或多个实际的图标组成，其中每个图标都代表特定大小和颜色深度的图标版本。To cater to the various display sizes, an icon file is composed of one or more actual icons where each one represents a version of the icon that targets a specific size and color depth. 例如，一个图标只能有一个16色的16x16 像素图标，而另一个图标可能包含16色和256色的16x16 像素和32x32 像素图标。For example, one icon may only have a single 16x16 pixel icon with 16 colors, while another may contain 16x16 pixel and 32x32 pixel icons with both 16 colors and 256 colors. 如果图标文件中存在所有可能的大小和颜色深度的图标， 将使用相应的图标。If icons for all possible sizes and color depths exist within an icon file, will use the appropriate icon. 如果图标文件仅包含所有可能图标的子集， 会按减小大小和颜色深度顺序使用下一个最适合的图标。If an icon file contains only a subset of all the possible icons, uses the next most appropriate icon in order of decreasing sizes and color depth. 结果是，会始终使用图标，但使用的图标可能不会以所需的大小和颜色深度为目标。The result is that an icon will always be used by , although the icon used may not target the required size and color depth. 例如，具有16种颜色的16x16 像素图标可用于显示为具有256颜色的32x32 像素图标。For example, a 16x16 pixel icon with 16 colors may be used for display as a 32x32 pixel icon with 256 colors. 这可能会导致意外的视觉效果（如 pixilation），但可以通过为所有目标大小和颜色深度创建图标来避免出现这种情况。This can cause undesirable visual effects, such as pixilation, but may be avoided by creating icons for all targeted sizes and color depths. > [!NOTE] > 当窗口承载于浏览器中时，不能设置或获取此属性。You cannot set or get this property when a window is hosted in a browser. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置窗口图标。The following example shows how to set a window icon. [!code-xaml[WindowIconSnippets#WindowIconSetXAML](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WindowIconSnippets/XAML/MainWindow.xaml#windowiconsetxaml)] [!code-csharp[WindowIconSnippets#SetWindowIconInCode](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WindowIconSnippets/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml.cs#setwindowiconincode)] [!code-vb[WindowIconSnippets#SetWindowIconInCode](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WindowIconSnippets/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#setwindowiconincode)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当父窗口通过调用 打开子窗口时，将在父窗口和子窗口之间建立隐式关系。When a child window is opened by a parent window by calling , an implicit relationship is established between both parent and child window. 此关系强制实施某些行为，包括与最小化、最大化和还原有关的行为。This relationship enforces certain behaviors, including with respect to minimizing, maximizing, and restoring. 当父窗口通过调用 创建子窗口时，子窗口与父窗口之间没有关系。When a child window is created by a parent window by calling , however, the child window does not have a relationship with the parent window. 这意味着：This means that: - 子窗口没有对父窗口的引用。The child window does not have a reference to the parent window. - 子窗口的行为不依赖于父窗口的行为;任何一个窗口都可以覆盖另一个窗口，或者将其最小化、最大化和还原。The behavior of the child window is not dependent on the behavior of the parent window; either window can cover the other, or be minimized, maximized, and restored independently of the other. 为了使你能够在子窗口和父窗口之间创建关系， 支持所有权的概念。To allow you to create a relationship between a child window and a parent window, supports the notion of ownership. 当使用对另一窗口（所有者窗口）的引用设置窗口（拥有的窗口）的 属性时，将建立所有权。Ownership is established when the property of a window (the owned window) is set with a reference to another window (the owner window). 建立此关系后，将出现以下行为：Once this relationship is established, the following behaviors are exhibited: - 如果最小化所有者窗口，则其所有拥有的窗口也将最小化。If an owner window is minimized, all its owned windows are minimized as well. - 如果将拥有的窗口最小化，则其所有者不会最小化。If an owned window is minimized, its owner is not minimized. - 如果 "所有者" 窗口处于最大化状态，则会还原所有者窗口及其拥有的窗口。If an owner window is maximized, both the owner window and its owned windows are restored. - 所有者窗口永远不会涵盖拥有的窗口。An owner window can never cover an owned window. - 未使用 打开的拥有的窗口不是模式的。Owned windows that were not opened using are not modal. 用户仍可以与所有者窗口交互。The user can still interact with the owner window. - 如果关闭所有者窗口，则其拥有的窗口也会关闭。If you close an owner window, its owned windows are also closed. - 如果拥有的窗口是由其所有者窗口使用 打开的，并且 "所有者" 窗口关闭，则不会引发所拥有的窗口的 事件。If an owned window was opened by its owner window using , and the owner window is closed, the owned window's event is not raised. 通过调用 打开子窗口时，还应设置子窗口的 属性。When you open a child window by calling , you should also set the property of the child window. 否则，你的用户将无法通过按 "任务栏" 按钮来还原子窗口和父窗口。If you don't, then your users won't be able to restore both child window and parent window by pressing the task bar button. 相反，按 "任务栏" 按钮将生成一个窗口列表，其中包括子窗口和父窗口，以供选择;仅还原所选窗口。Instead, pressing the task bar button will yield a list of windows, including both child and parent window, for them to select; only the selected window is restored. > [!IMPORTANT] > 还应在通过调用 打开的窗口上设置 属性，以确保的行为正确。You should also set the property on a window that is opened by calling to ensure correct behavior with . > [!NOTE] > 当窗口承载于浏览器中时，不能设置或获取此属性。You cannot set or get this property when a window is hosted in a browser. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何建立所有者/拥有关系。The following example shows how to establish the owner/owned relationship. [!code-csharp[WindowOwnerOwnedWindowsSnippets#SetWindowOwnerCODE](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WindowOwnerOwnedWindowsSnippets/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml.cs#setwindowownercode)] [!code-vb[WindowOwnerOwnedWindowsSnippets#SetWindowOwnerCODE](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WindowOwnerOwnedWindowsSnippets/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#setwindowownercode)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有四个选项：There are four options: - **NoResize**。**NoResize**. 用户无法调整窗口的大小。The user cannot resize the window. 不显示 "最大化" 和 "最小化" 框。The Maximize and Minimize boxes are not shown. - **CanMinimize**。**CanMinimize**. 用户只能最小化窗口并从任务栏还原。The user can only minimize the window and restore it from the taskbar. 同时显示 "最小化" 和 "最大化" 框，但只启用 "最小化" 框。The Minimize and Maximize boxes are both shown, but only the Minimize box is enabled. - **CanResize**。**CanResize**. 用户可以通过使用 "最小化" 和 "最大化" 框以及围绕窗口的可拖动轮廓来完全调整窗口的大小。The user has the full ability to resize the window, using the Minimize and Maximize boxes, and a draggable outline around the window. 显示和启用 "最小化" 和 "最大化" 框。The Minimize and Maximize boxes are shown and enabled. （默认值）。(Default). - **CanResizeWithGrip**。**CanResizeWithGrip**. 此选项与 具有相同的功能，但会将 "调整手柄" 添加到窗口的右下角。This option has the same functionality as , but adds a "resize grip" to the lower right corner of the window. > [!NOTE] > 当窗口承载于浏览器中时，不能设置或获取此属性。You cannot set or get this property when a window is hosted in a browser. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`||

remarks.format: ## Remarks 还原矩形是窗口在最小化或最大化之前占用的区域。The restore rectangle is the region occupied by the window before it was minimized or maximized. 在应用程序关闭之前，可以使用 来保存窗口的最后一个大小和位置，并在下次应用程序启动时检索这些值，以将窗口还原到用户离开它的方式。You can use to save the last size and location of a window before an application is closed, and retrieve those values the next time an application starts to restore a window to the way a user left it. 如果在显示窗口之前或在窗口关闭之后 查询，则返回 。If you query before the window has been shown or after it has been closed, is returned. > [!NOTE] > 当窗口承载于浏览器中时，不能获取此属性。You cannot get this property when a window is hosted in a browser. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 和独立存储来确保窗口的大小和位置与上一次显示窗口时的大小和位置相同。The following example uses and isolated storage to ensure the size and location of a window are the same as they were the previous time the window was shown. [!code-xaml[WindowRestoreBoundsSnippets#WindowRestoreBoundsXAML1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WindowRestoreBoundsSnippets/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml#windowrestoreboundsxaml1)] [!code-xaml[WindowRestoreBoundsSnippets#WindowRestoreBoundsXAML2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WindowRestoreBoundsSnippets/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml#windowrestoreboundsxaml2)] [!code-csharp[WindowRestoreBoundsSnippets#WindowRestoreBoundsCODEBEHIND1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WindowRestoreBoundsSnippets/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml.cs#windowrestoreboundscodebehind1)] [!code-vb[WindowRestoreBoundsSnippets#WindowRestoreBoundsCODEBEHIND1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WindowRestoreBoundsSnippets/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#windowrestoreboundscodebehind1)] [!code-csharp[WindowRestoreBoundsSnippets#WindowRestoreBoundsCODEBEHIND2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WindowRestoreBoundsSnippets/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml.cs#windowrestoreboundscodebehind2)] [!code-vb[WindowRestoreBoundsSnippets#WindowRestoreBoundsCODEBEHIND2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WindowRestoreBoundsSnippets/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#windowrestoreboundscodebehind2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Show() cil managed

summary.span: 打开窗口并返回，而不等待新打开的窗口关闭。

span.span: Opens a window and returns without waiting for the newly opened window to close.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实例化 类时，默认情况下它不可见。When the class is instantiated, it is not visible by default. 将显示一个窗口，并立即返回，而不会等待窗口关闭。 shows a window and returns immediately, without waiting for the window to be closed. 因此，打开的窗口不会阻止用户与应用程序中的其他窗口交互。Consequently, the opened window does not prevent users from interacting with other windows in the application. 这种类型的窗口称为*无模式*窗口。This type of window is called a *modeless* window. 无模式窗口的常见示例是属性窗口、工具箱和调色板。Common examples of modeless windows are properties windows, toolboxes, and palettes. 若要限制用户与特定窗口交互，必须通过调用 打开该窗口。To restrict a user to interacting with a specific window, the window must be opened by calling . 通过调用 打开的窗口不会自动与打开该窗口的窗口建立关系;具体而言，打开的窗口不知道哪个窗口打开了它。A window that is opened by calling does not automatically have a relationship with the window that opened it; specifically, the opened window does not know which window opened it. 此关系可以使用 属性建立，并使用 属性进行管理。This relationship can be established using the property and managed using the property. 调用 实现与将 对象 属性设置为 相同的最终结果。Calling achieves the same end result as setting property of the object to . 但是，这两种情况之间的区别在于计时透视。However, there is a difference between the two from a timing perspective. 调用 是在引发子窗口上的 事件之后仅返回的同步操作：Calling is a synchronous operation that returns only after the event on the child window has been raised: [!code-csharp[WindowShowTimingSnippets#ShowSync](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WindowShowTimingSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#showsync)] [!code-vb[WindowShowTimingSnippets#ShowSync](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WindowShowTimingSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#showsync)] 但是，设置 是一种立即返回的异步操作：Setting , however, is an asynchronous operation that returns immediately: [!code-csharp[WindowShowTimingSnippets#ShowASync](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WindowShowTimingSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#showasync)] [!code-vb[WindowShowTimingSnippets#ShowASync](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WindowShowTimingSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#showasync)] 如果设置 ，则在设置 之前注册的任何窗口事件都不会引发，除非在设置了 的方法完成执行之后。When setting , any window events you register before you set may not be raised until after the method in which you set has completed execution. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何打开无模式窗口。The following sample demonstrates how to open a modeless window. [!code-csharp[WindowShowSnippets#WindowShowCODE](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WindowShowSnippets/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml.cs#windowshowcode)] [!code-vb[WindowShowSnippets#WindowShowCODE](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WindowShowSnippets/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#windowshowcode)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当打开 属性设置为 `false` 的窗口时，窗口将不会激活，并且在用户通过选择窗口手动激活窗口之前，不会引发其 事件。When a window with its property set to `false` is opened, the window is not activated and its event is not raised until a user manually activates the window by selecting it. 选择该窗口后，它将正常激活和停用。After the window is selected, it activates and deactivates normally. 若要防止窗口在打开时被激活，则必须将 属性设置为在显示窗口之前 `false` （通过调用 ）;将 设置为在显示窗口后 `false` 不起作用。To prevent a window from being activated when it opens, the property must be set to `false` before the window is shown (by calling ); setting to `false` after a window is shown has no effect. 通过调用 ，将 设置为以模式方式打开的窗口 `false`，不会产生任何影响。Setting to `false` on a window that is opened modally, by calling , has no real impact. 尽管不会激活模式窗口，但模式窗口会阻止用户激活任何其他打开的应用程序窗口。Although the modal window will not be activated, the modal window will prevent the user from activating any other open application windows. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用标记将窗口配置为在未激活的情况下打开。The following example shows how to use markup to configure a window to be opened without being activated. [!code-xaml[WindowShowActivatedSnippets#ShowUnactivatedMARKUP1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WindowShowActivatedSnippets/CSharp/AWindow.xaml#showunactivatedmarkup1)] [!code-csharp[WindowShowActivatedSnippets#ShowUnactivatedCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WindowShowActivatedSnippets/CSharp/AWindow.xaml.cs#showunactivatedcodebehind)] [!code-vb[WindowShowActivatedSnippets#ShowUnactivatedCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WindowShowActivatedSnippets/visualbasic/awindow.xaml.vb#showunactivatedcodebehind)] 下面的示例演示如何使用代码将窗口配置为在未激活的情况下打开。The following example shows how to use code to configure a window to be opened without it being activated. [!code-csharp[WindowShowActivatedSnippets#ShowUnactivatedWindowCODE](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WindowShowActivatedSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#showunactivatedwindowcode)] [!code-vb[WindowShowActivatedSnippets#ShowUnactivatedWindowCODE](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WindowShowActivatedSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#showunactivatedwindowcode)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实例化 类时，默认情况下它不可见。When a class is instantiated, it is not visible by default. 显示窗口，禁用应用程序中的所有其他窗口，并仅在窗口关闭时返回。 shows the window, disables all other windows in the application, and returns only when the window is closed. 这种类型的窗口称为*模式*窗口。This type of window is known as a *modal* window. 模式窗口主要用作对话框。Modal windows are primarily used as dialog boxes. 对话框是一种特殊类型的窗口，应用程序使用该窗口与用户交互以完成任务，如打开文件或打印文档。A dialog box is a special type of window that applications use to interact with users to complete tasks, such as opening files or printing documents. 对话框通常允许用户接受或取消在对话框关闭前显示的任务。Dialog boxes commonly allow users to accept or cancel the task for which they were shown before the dialog box is closed. 返回一个 值，该值指定是否接受或取消该活动。 returns a value that specifies whether the activity was accepted or canceled. 返回值是 属性在窗口关闭前具有的值。The return value is the value of the property before a window closes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see . 通过调用 方法打开的窗口不会自动与打开该方法的窗口建立关系;具体而言，打开的窗口不知道哪个窗口打开了它。A window that is opened by calling the method does not automatically have a relationship with the window that opened it; specifically, the opened window does not know which window opened it. 此关系可以使用 属性建立，并使用 属性进行管理。This relationship can be established using the property and managed using the property. 若要支持 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] 自动化（请参阅[UI 自动化概述](~/docs/framework/ui-automation/ui-automation-overview.md)），必须为通过调用 打开的窗口设置 。To support [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] automation (see [UI Automation Overview](~/docs/framework/ui-automation/ui-automation-overview.md)), must be set for a window opened by calling . 如果模式 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] 窗口（通过调用 打开的窗口）关闭，则会重新激活以前激活的窗口。When a modal [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] window (a window opened by calling ) is closed, the previously activated window is reactivated. 如果模式 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] 窗口具有所有者窗口（请参阅 ），则当模式 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] 窗口关闭时，除非以前激活的窗口，否则不会重新激活所有者窗口。If a modal [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] window has an owner window (see ), the owner window is not reactivated when the modal [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] window is closed unless it was the previously activated window. > [!NOTE] > 当窗口承载于浏览器中时，不能调用此方法。This method cannot be called when a window is hosted in a browser. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何打开模式窗口。The following sample demonstrates how to open a modal window. [!code-csharp[WindowShowDialogSnippets#WindowShowDialogCODE](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WindowShowDialogSnippets/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml.cs#windowshowdialogcode)] [!code-vb[WindowShowDialogSnippets#WindowShowDialogCODE](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WindowShowDialogSnippets/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#windowshowdialogcode)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 设置为 ，则 或 将不起作用;可以设置这两个属性，但将其设置为的值不会应用于该窗口。When is set to , setting either or has no effect; both properties can be set, but the values they are set with are not applied to the window. 将 设置为 时，设置 不会更改窗口的高度。When is set to , setting does not change the height of the window. 将 设置为 时，设置 不会更改窗口的宽度。When is set to , setting does not change the width of the window. 如果 的值不是 ：If has a value other than : - 如果用户使用重设大小手柄或拖动边框来调整窗口的大小，则会自动将 设置为 。 is automatically set to if a user resizes the window by using the resize grip or dragging the border. - 如果内容大小以导致窗口大小调整的方式变化，则会引发 。If the size of the content changes in a way that causes the window to resize itself, is raised. 如果窗口是透明的（请参阅 ），则应考虑将 设置为 ，以确保该窗口不会大于其可见内容。If a window is transparent (see ), you should consider setting to to ensure the window is no larger than its visible content. > [!NOTE] > 当窗口承载于浏览器中时，不能设置或获取此属性。You cannot set or get this property when a window is hosted in a browser. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在代码中设置 属性，以指定如何调整窗口大小以适应其内容。The following example shows how to set the property in code to specify how a window resizes to fit its content. remarks.format: ## Remarks 将 `WindowStartupLocation` 属性设置为 会使窗口根据其 和 属性值定位。Setting the `WindowStartupLocation` property to causes a window to be positioned according to its and property values. 如果未指定 或 属性，则其值由 Windows 决定。If either the or properties aren't specified, their values are determined by Windows. 将 `WindowStartupLocation` 属性设置为 " 会使窗口位于包含鼠标光标的屏幕的中心。Setting the `WindowStartupLocation` property to causes a window to be positioned in the center of the screen that contains the mouse cursor. 如果已指定，将 `WindowStartupLocation` 属性设置为 会导致窗口位于其所有者窗口的中心（请参阅 ）。Setting the `WindowStartupLocation` property to causes a window to be positioned in the center of its owner window (see ), if specified. 所有者窗口可以是另一个 WPF 窗口或非 WPF 窗口。The owner window can be either another WPF window or a non-WPF window. > [!NOTE] > 有关具有非 WPF 窗口的 WPF 窗口的详细信息，请参阅[wpf 和 Win32 互操作](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/wpf-and-win32-interoperation.md)性和 。For more information about WPF windows with non-WPF windows, see [WPF and Win32 Interoperation](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/wpf-and-win32-interoperation.md) and . 如果未指定所有者窗口，将按照与 `WindowStartupLocation` 属性设置为 相同的方式确定窗口的位置。If an owner window is not specified, the position of the window is determined in the same way as if the `WindowStartupLocation` property is set to . > [!NOTE] > 当窗口承载于浏览器中时，不能设置或获取此属性的值。You cannot set or get the value of this property when a window is hosted in a browser.
